body.p: The undersigned understanding that a petition is pending before the Governor for the pardon of a slave convicted by the Franklin circuit court at its last term, of the crime of attempting to poison several citizens of Frankfort and sentences her to be hung -- or to procure the commutation of the sentence of said slave to imprisonment for life -- would respectfully remonstrate against the exercise of executive clemency in the case of said slave either by the granting of a pardon or the commutation of the sentence to imprisonment for life
